title: daxkie
author: daxkie
content: Here you have the roles of the Ambassadors. ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡Leader or Country Leader- Organize AMA's, events- Zoom in promoting the currency- Recruit new Ambassadors Content Creators- Creation of Videos / Graphics to put on different social media. Tutorials, educational videos- Write blogs, articles- Meme creationTranslator- Unofficial translations of documents, videos, guides. Any languageSocial Media Engagement / Influencer-Share information about the project on social networks and groups (on the social networks we decide). in personal account-Crypto Influencers who are part of crypto communities in the most diverse social media-Create engagement contentCommunity Partner-(This is for anyone who owns a community, groups, etc.)Promote the Token in our community and we can promote it too or give out rewards.Community moderators and Shillers-Any country Send me a message on telegram @bikitrumpTHANK YOU!

comments.author: daxkie
comments.body: Respect post!!! Do not post negative comment on this thread. That comment will not help you and us as well.

comments.author: Gianluca95

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: daxkie on June 17, 2022, 09:56:34 AMRespect post!!! Do not post negative comment on this thread. That comment will not help you and us as well.Â  You should atleast post the project that your applicants will gonna work with and the corresponding compensation plan per job position you are looking at. This thread is supposed to be services that pay in Bitcoin so you should follow the rules and respect it too.This is a second batch so it means that you already manage to get a first batch of applicants, with that in consideration, You already paid the first batch and it will be good to know if that is in Bitcoin. Wish you luck.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Please carefully read my full explanation or telegram and I would love to know what total of administrator and Moderator you actually needed. I will be glad to receive your feedback, please I advised you share your project details with us on TG to take a clearer review of your venture.

comments.author: DireWolfM14

Â What currency will be used to compensate the ambassadors? Â This section is for bitcoin services only, or jobs that are paid in bitcoin. comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on June 17, 2022, 02:59:47 PMQuote from: daxkie on June 17, 2022, 09:53:12 AM~What is this about? Â Ambassadors for what, is it an altcoin you're attempting to promote? Â What currency will be used to compensate the ambassadors? Â This section is for bitcoin services only, or jobs that are paid in bitcoin. Â It seems like this relating to an altcoin:Quote from: daxkie on June 17, 2022, 09:53:12 AMZoom in promoting the currency~Promote the Token in our community and we can promote it too or give out rewards.Altcoin jobs need to be posted in the Altcoin service section.Quote from: daxkie on June 17, 2022, 09:53:12 AMCommunity moderators and ShillersNobody likes a shill.It's probably a new scam NFT or some ponzi. The fact that he answered in the thread and ignored your post proves that it's some shady deal. What's there to hide really? Either it's a shitcoin, but he knows he'll get more response in the main service section so he keeps quiet about it or moderators will move the thread, or it's a scam and he doesn't want a backlash before he's even able to launch.
